articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Machine Plant
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the machine plant managed by Jon Tong Ryol.
					 Kim Jong Un went round the monument to the field guidance given by leader Kim Jong Il, the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the plant.
					
					 He said that the plant which was established by President Kim Il Sung after personally initiating its construction and choosing its site, foreseeing the nation's development of the machine-building industry is associated with the devoted efforts Kim Jong Il made by visiting it several times and clearly indicating the road to be followed by it.
					
					 Going round the processing shop, general assembling shop and other places of the plant, he learnt in detail about production and its management and operation.
					
					 Watching the cutting-edge machine products being assembled at the plant, he praised its workers for successfully building them with their own efforts and technology.
					
					 He said that the plant should fulfill its plan without fail through a high-pitched drive for keeping production going at a high rate and make thorough preparations for hitting a higher production goal.
					
					 "To this end it is necessary for the plant to dynamically push forward the work for updating the aging equipment and modernizing and automating the production processes", he said, instructing it to grasp the main link and accelerate the updating by determining the proper order of priority for it.
					
					 Noting that it is not easy to update the plant, he underscored the need to elaborately and scrupulously push ahead with the work like going up one step after another, not being carried away by impatience.
					
					 Saying that the quality is as important as the quantitative indices in production, he called for making a dynamic drive for improving the quality of products.
					
					 Noting that many more modern machines are required by various fields at present, he called for operating machines in full capacity by taking thorough measures for the supply of materials and told the officials to channel efforts into improving the supply service for the workers.
					
					 He set again the targets to be attained by the plant in the future and specified tasks and ways for doing so.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol, Han Kwang Sang, Jo Chun Ryong, Hong Yong Chil and Jang Chang Ha.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Volleyball Game
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Men's Volleyball Game
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, watched men's volleyball game between the General Bureau of Civil Aviation and the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport.
					 He waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the players and spectators.
					
					 The two teams fully displayed their volleyball technique.
					
					 The team of the General Bureau of Civil Aviation won the game.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was pleased with the successful match.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to positively conduct mass sports activities in the future, too, in order to make everybody actively contribute to labor and defence with strong physical body. He set forth tasks for doing so.
					
					 Among the spectators were Kang Ki Sop, Rim Kwang Ung and other leading officials of the General Bureau of Civil Aviation, Kang Jong Gwan, Chon Kwang Sik and other leading officials of the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, commanding officers of the KPA and senior officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Sung Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Sung Ho
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Sung Ho, chairman of the Central Auditing Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and director of the Central Bureau of Statistics, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Nay Pyi Taw
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Nay Pyi Taw
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong arrived in Nay Pyi Taw, Myanmar on Saturday.
					 The delegation left Hanoi on Friday after visiting Vietnam.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Chad
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Chad
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Idriss Deby Itno, president and head of state of Chad, on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message reaffirmed the steadfast stand of the DPRK to steadily strengthen the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries and wished the Chadian president success in his responsible work and the Chadian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Inaugural Ceremony of Paektu-Halla Car Riding Held
articles.content:
Inaugural Ceremony of Paektu-Halla Car Riding Held
Samjiyon, August 10 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula" took place atop Mt. Paektu Sunday.
					 The riding will mark an occasion in showing the aspiration and will of fellow countrymen to usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the unfurled banner of the June 15 joint declaration in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Present there were members of the Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group headed by Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans who is chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, Ri Song Gon, vice-director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, officials concerned and lecturers of the Paektusan Revolutionary Battle Sites.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 They said: We have the inaugural ceremony of the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula" in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, on which the soul of the nation took  root and which is associated with footsteps made by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese bloody war.
					
					 The division of the country is the greatest tragedy of the nation, they said, adding: To reunify the country is the ardent aspiration of fellow countrymen which brooks no further delay.
					
					 The riding will help all Koreans in the north, south and abroad have the firm will to put an end of the history of division forced by outsiders and bring earlier the new morning of reunification with the  concerted efforts of the nation, they stressed.
					
					 The riding being held amid the attention and expectation of the governments of the DPRK and Russia will have a good influence on the daily growing DPRK-Russia friendly relations, they said.
					
					 Then the riding group left Mt. Paektu, the ancestral mountain.

articles.title: Russia-Cross Korean Peninsula Car Riding Group Visits Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Russia-Cross Korean Peninsula Car Riding Group Visits Area of Mt. Paektu
Samjiyon, August 10 (KCNA) -- A Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group headed by Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans who is chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, visited the area of Mt. Paektu Sunday. The group is taking part in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula". 
					 Members of the group laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Samjiyon Grand Monument and the mosaic in the Paektusan Secret Camp depicting the images of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They visited leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and went round historic relics, being briefed on the fact that he was born as the son of guerrilla, possessed of the spirit of Mt. Paektu, and grew up while hearing the gunfire of the anti-Japanese war as a lullaby. 
					
					 They had a photo session in token of their visit to the old home in the Paektusan Secret Camp and went round the Headquarters log cabin where Kim Il Sung stayed, etc.

articles.title: Disbandment of Anti-DPRK Plot-Breeding Organization Demanded
articles.content:
Disbandment of Anti-DPRK Plot-Breeding Organization Demanded
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Intelligence Service renamed a plot-breeding organization "Central Joint Interrogation Center" "Center for Protection of Defected North Koreans".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says the farce of renaming the center is nothing but a camouflage to calm down the public demanding the disbandment of the "Central Joint Interrogation Center" and an end to the anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 The center is an anti-DPRK plot-breeding center which put in custody inhabitants of the DPRK whom the IS allured and abducted, practiced all sorts of evil acts against them and painted them as spies, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The IS should have stopped fabricating spy cases and kicking up a racket against the DPRK and disbanded the center as demanded by the public. But it staged the farce of renaming it, quite contrary to the mind-set of the public.
					
					 The farce is a product of the scheme to continue breeding plots against the DPRK by alluring and abducting its inhabitants and fabricating spy cases while keeping the center.
					
					 Just as a leopard can not change its spots, the criminal nature of the plot-breeding organization can never change.
					
					 The IS should stop the mean farce of misleading the public at home and abroad and immediately disband the den of breeding plots.

articles.title: S. Korean Political Camp Accused of Turning down Demands of Bereaved Families
articles.content:
S. Korean Political Camp Accused of Turning down Demands of Bereaved Families
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations including the Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident held a press conference outside the building of the puppet National Assembly on August 7 at which they voiced opposition to the special bill on the tragedy agreed upon by the ruling and opposition parties.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the floor leaders of the ruling and opposition parties of agreeing with the proposal on investing a special prosecutor with the rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the ferry sinking disaster that day.
					
					 They expressed indignation at the agreement, noting that it is little short of inflicting double death on children as it was tantamount to turning down the demands of the bereaved families and the people for investing the fact-finding committee with the rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the tragedy. 
					
					 Such agreement can never arrest the actions of the people as it was deliberately made without hearing the views of the bereaved families, they noted.

articles.title: Those Responsible for Death of Private Should Be Called to Task: S. Korean Media
articles.content:
Those Responsible for Death of Private Should Be Called to Task: S. Korean Media
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- South Korean newspapers on August 7 carried editorials as regards the disclosure of the fact that Kim Kwan Jin turned a blind eye to the death of a private by violence in the 28th Division of the puppet army at a time when he was holding the post of minister of Defense.
					 Kyunghyang Daily News said Kim Kwan Jin let those responsible be punished with cotton club only after half a month after receiving a report on the death and saw to it that the case was underreported.
					
					 The death of privates by harsh violence is unabated because those responsible are not called to task every time the cases happened, it noted.
					
					 It called for making an unhindered investigation into all including Kim Kwan Jin, properly probing the truth behind the death of the private and bringing those responsible to account. 
					
					 Seoul Shinmun said that thorough-going probe into the truth about the case is necessary, adding Kim Kwan Jin should be called to account.
					
					 Hangyore said Kim is chiefly to blame for the case.
					
					 Hankuk Ilbo noted that the chief executive should seriously call into question those responsible for the case and Kim Kwan Jin should not be an exception.
					
					 Internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on August 6 carried an article titled "It is hard for Kim Kwan Jin to survive". It noted:
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin took no measure even though he received a detailed report on the case. This raised the issue of his personnel affairs even within the conservative camp.

articles.title: Conspiracy in Political Camp Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conspiracy in Political Camp Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea Friday made public a statement.
					 The statement said the ruling and opposition parties joined hands to cover up the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, far from instituting a special law for probing the truth.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" has only been concerned for the issue of appointing a special prosecutor to curry favor with the "president", not thinking about setting up a fact-finding committee which has the rights to investigation and indictment as demanded by the bereaved families, the statement deplored.
					
					 There is no reason for the political party failing to speak for the people to exist, it noted, terming the "Saenuri Party" a group of depraved guys.
					
					 It urged the opposition parties to cancel the collusion with the ruling party and resume the negotiations for instituting a special law, though belatedly.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Moves to Ignite War against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Moves to Ignite War against DPRK Slammed
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Civic, public and religious organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on August 7 in denunciation of the moves to ignite a war against the north, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 At the press conference the organizations denounced south Korea and the U.S. for planning to stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills in mid-August by mobilizing huge armed forces in different parts of south Korea. They went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities expressed their stand of welcoming the U.S. action to deploy THAAD in south Korea. This is aimed to do harm to compatriots.
					
					 They urged the authorities to stop war moves harmful to compatriots and opt for reconciliation and exchange with the north.
					
					 They thrust a letter of protest to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Benin, Nigeria
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Lectures and film shows took place in Benin and Nigeria from Aug. 1 to 5 to mark the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 Films shown included Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Arch of Triumph".
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a lecture titled "Korea's liberation, a turning point of history":
					
					 The liberation of Korea was a historic event for the Korean people.
					
					 It enabled the Korean people to lead an independent and creative life as genuine masters of the state and society.
					
					 The DPRK is admired by the international community as it has firmly defended its ideology, social system and cause, while keeping to the road chosen by it for a long period.
					
					 The realities in which the DPRK making a new leaping progress and innovations in its efforts to build a thriving socialist nation once again make people think about the historic significance of Korea's liberation which brought about a turning point in shaping out the destiny of the people and achieving the prosperity of the country.
					
					 After seeing a film, the director of a company of Nigeria praised President Kim Il Sung for defeating the Japanese imperialists with arms and liberating Korea.
					
					 He said that the DPRK is a strong country defending the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation with mighty arms.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was posted by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on July 27.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), deals with the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original one that has been developed and systemized with its intrinsic principles, and a revolutionary and popular one that truly serves the people in their struggle for independence.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for studying and explaining the Juche philosophy as intended by the party and thoroughly applying it to the revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita fabrica de maquinaria dirigida por Jon Tong Ryol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita fabrica de maquinaria dirigida por Jon Tong Ryol
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la fabrica de maquinaria dirigida por Jon Tong Ryol.
					Primero, el Mariscal recorrio el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					En la fabrica, que fue inaugurada por la iniciativa del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien previo el desarrollo de la industria de construccion de maquinaria del pais, estan impregnados la abnegacion e ingentes esfuerzos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien la visito en varias veces y aclaro el camino a seguir por la fabrica, subrayo el Mariscal.
					
					Recorriendo el taller de elaboracion, el de montaje general y otros lugares, averiguo en detalles el estado de la produccion y de la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					Al ver los productos mecanicos de nivel de punta montados en la fabrica, evaluo que los producen bien por sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que la fabrica debe cumplir sin falta el plan asumido normalizando la produccion y debe preparar con constancia la labor para lograr la meta de produccion mas alta.
					
					Para ese efecto, hay que desplegar con vigor la obra para renovar los equipos atrasados y modernizar y automatizar el proceso de produccion, senalo y anadio que debe acelerar la modernizacion precisando el eslabon clave segun el orden de prioridades.
					
					Subrayo que para la modernizacion, no debe estar impaciente sino realizarla apaciblemente.
					
					Dio la importancia tanto a la mejora de calidad de productos como al indice cuantitativo.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que en la actualidad varias ramas exigen muchos equipos mecanicos modernos y exhorto a poner en pleno funcionamiento la fabrica al tomar perfectamente las medidas de suministro de materiales, e hizo hincapie en que los funcionarios deben esforzarse por mejorar el servicio de abastecimiento para los obreros.
					
					El Mariscal definio de nuevo la meta a ser conquistada en el futuro por la fabrica y aclaro las tareas y remedos concretos para el particular.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol, Han Kwang Sang, Jo Chun Ryong, Hong Yong Chil y Jang Chang Ha.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ve juego de voleibol entre la DGAC y el MTTM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ve juego de voleibol entre la DGAC y el MTTM
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el juego de voleibol entre la Direccion General de Aviacion Civil y el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo.
					El Mariscal respondio cordialmente a las efusivas aclamaciones de los jugadores y espectadores.
					
					Los dos equipos pusieron de pleno manifiesto sus tecnicas de voleibol.
					
					La Direccion General de Aviacion Civil vencio al rival. 
					
					El Mariscal expreso su alegria por haber efectuado con exito la competencia.
					
					Para hacer que todos hagan gran aporte al trabajo y la defensa nacional con la sana fuerza fisica, es preciso popularizar con animacion tambien en el futuro el deporte y cultura fisica 
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Kang Ki Sop, Rim Kwang Ung y otros funcionarios directivos de la Direccion General de Aviacion Civil, Kang Jong Gwan, Chon Kwang Sik y otros directivos del Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, los miembros de mando del EPC y los cuadros del CC del PTC.
